title: CreativeMarket - Pixel Art - One Click Actions
description:
Relive The 80s in One Click

Dude! Remember all that sweet pixel art in the story scenes of Ninja Gaiden? I loved that stuff. Now it's all about 3D and VR and AR and a bunch of other mumbo jumbo. I say realism is overrated. Join me in a look back to a time when "Nintendo Thumb" was a real ailment affecting thousands, when Top Gun was hands down the coolest movie ever made, and when pixel art was freaking mind-blowing. It only takes one click my friends. Just one click, and the power is yours.

Pixel Art Any Photo or Illustration

With these easy-to-use Photoshop actions, all you have to do is open an image, click the Play button, and you're done! You won't even have to blow in the cartridge!

Choose Your Level Of Detail

Some images look better with more glorious pixel detail, others with less. Either way, you're covered. This set comes with multiple actions that allow you to use more or less detail.


DEMO: https://creativemarket.com/secondfret/605160-Pixel-Art-One-Click-Actions
